Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: Sekanina, Z., S. Edberg, IHW AMATEUR SPECTROGRAMS OF COMET 1P/HALLEY, IHW-C-AMSP-N-NDR-HALLEY-V1.0, NASA Planetary Data System, UNK.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Report of spectrograms of comet 1P/Halley taken by amateur astronomers and submitted as part of the International Halley Watch Amateur Network.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: Report of spectrograms of comet 1P/Halley taken by amateur astronomers and submitted as part of the International Halley Watch Amateur Network. No digital data are included in these files - only the observational parameters are recorded. The documented photographic plates have not been digitized or included in the archive directly.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= This data set consists of documentation regarding 45 spectra obtained by various amateur astronomers as part of the International Halley Watch (IHW) Amateur Observations Network. The FITS headers and PDS labels included document the observational parameters of the spectra obtained. The spectra themselves were photographic. The plates have not been digitized or otherwise included directly in this PDS archive.
The IHW archive volume documentation notes:
The spectra listed were made with both prism and grating spectrographs in a variety of modes. These spectra are perhaps the only ones in the IHW archive which cover the full range of visual wavelength in one record. A few spectra extend into the photographic infrared.
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note: See the detailed discussion of the amateur net submissions in the DOCUMENT/ subdirectory of any of the IHW volumes HAL_0019-23.
